title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2000.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2000.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

Parts 2000 through 2002 set forth the procedures and
requirements relating to the Housing Commissioner's recommendation of approval
of land acquisition to the commissioner pursuant to subdivision 2 of section
15.03
of the Parks, Recreation and

Historic Preservation Law for the establishment or expansion of neighborhood
parks and are promulgated pursuant to subdivision 3(c) of section 15.03 of said
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
